resources.name: joined-teams
resources.title: Joined Teams
resources.description: Get a list of all joined Teams

resources.name: my-chats
resources.title: My Chats
resources.description: Retrieves a list of the user's 1:1 and group chat threads, including basic metadata like topic and timestamps.

resources.name: my-presence
resources.title: My presence
resources.description: Returns the current presence status of the signed-in user (e.g., Available, Busy, Away).

resources.name: my-teamwork-devices
resources.title: My teamwork devices
resources.description: Lists devices used with Teams, such as headsets or peripherals, including device type and current activity state.

resources.name: my-teams-apps
resources.title: My Teams apps
resources.description: Retrieves the list of Teams apps installed for the signed-in user, including app ID and display name.

resources.name: my-associated-teams
resources.title: My associated teams
resources.description: Lists Teams the user is indirectly associated with (e.g., via tags), including name and classification.
